name: Diamond
description: An exotic beauty that catches the eyes of everyone. Loves being the center of attention and has the kind of charm that make people bow down to her.

passiveSkill.name: Bewitching Dancer
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "Diamond's Heal Rate in battle increases by {placeholder}. When she appears, Ally partner with the lowest HP is returned to the hand, and receives {placeholder} ATK, and {placeholder} HP Max."}

uniqueSkill.name: Peacock's Veil
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "I am not Princess Iron Fan! Diamond restores HP equal to ATK * {placeholder} to the 2 allies with the lowest HP immediately, then restores HP equal to ATK * {placeholder} every round for 2 rounds. Also increases the targets' ATK by {placeholder} and DEF by {placeholder} also for 2 rounds."}

specialSkill.name: Invasive Wind
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "The peacock shows off its brilliant plumes. Diamond attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, restoring {placeholder} Rage.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Wind Scythe
normalSkill.description: Diamond swings her colorful fan. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: I am not Princess Iron Fan! Diamond restores HP equal to ATK * {placeholder} to the 2 allies with the lowest HP immediately, then restores HP equal to ATK * {placeholder} every round for 2 rounds. Also increases the targets' ATK by {placeholder} and DEF by {placeholder} also for 2 rounds.
templateData.lens5.skill: Diamond's Heal Rate in battle increases by {placeholder}. When she appears, Ally partner with the lowest HP is returned to the hand, and receives {placeholder} ATK, and {placeholder} HP Max.
templateData.lens6.skill: The peacock shows off its brilliant plumes. Diamond attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, restoring {placeholder} Rage.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}
